messages.message:
Hey folks, I have started to get a file service bad request error for every request that is landing at file-service (one of the examples below) after pulling the latest master. Tested by building off of 24.30 as well, not seeing this issue there.
```2024/08/01 15:23:24 ERROR fileservice/clients/s3_client.go:374 -- Failure during stat. Path: a6589436-9bfb-419a-a5d4-56c29b1973e3/System/tmp/IndexService Err: operation error S3: HeadObject, https response error StatusCode: 400, RequestID: XFJADK2EP500FZVH, HostID: NtnNVlANbHPrAxy/NEAntzA2WbYoFc1QvEW6SE2UK7s/a5xb/5T8JC0jiBnfHDkabTfFHjq1iMc=, api error BadRequest: Bad Request```
Have there been any recent changes that might cause this?
Same issue, for me on local. Dogfood works
On local! Environments seem to be working correctly.
